SELECT C.LOC_CD , C.LOC_NM , B.BARCODE , B.ITEM_CD , B.ITEM_NM , B.QTY , B.MAKE_DT , B.EFFT_DT FROM TB_STOCK A INNER JOIN TB_BARCODE B ON A.BARCODE = B.BARCODE
INNER JOIN TB_LOC C ON A.LOC_CD = C.LOC_CD
WHERE B.ITEM_CD = #{itemCd} ORDER BY B.EFFT_DT, LOC_CD LIMIT 5

SELECT B.BARCODE , B.ITEM_NM , B.ITEM_CD , B.QTY , C.CAPA_QTY, C.USE_YN , C.LOC_NM , C.SORT FROM TB_STOCK A INNER JOIN TB_BARCODE B ON A.BARCODE = B.BARCODE INNER JOIN TB_LOC C ON A.LOC_CD = C.LOC_CD UNION ALL SELECT '' AS BARCODE , '' AS ITEM_NM , '' AS ITE_CD , '' AS QTY , A.CAPA_QTY , A.USE_YN , A.LOC_NM , A.SORT FROM TB_LOC A LEFT JOIN TB_STOCK B ON A.LOC_CD = B.LOC_CD WHERE B.LOC_CD IS NULL
